resources.string: Please give our app 5 stars if you like it and write a short review
How to download a TikTok Video?
""" 1. Open TikTok App 2. Choose the video which you want to download 3. Tap "Share" icon and find "Copy Link" 4. Paste the link in our app and press "Show information" then press "Download" """
Where is my downloaded video saved? I can\'t find it
""" You should see your video in Gallery. If you can't find it, use FileManager and search files which begin with "TiktokVideo". """
""" There are several reasons: - Video is private. Private videos can't be downloaded. - Video is restricted by country. - There are problems with TikTok servers. Try download later. """
Downloaded video has a watermark. Why?
""" Some videos were downloaded by users with watermark and then re-uploaded again. Those videos have a watermark and we can't do anything with them. """
I can\'t play the downloaded video. Why?
""" Some videos require HD codec and can't be played by default player. Please use VLC media player or other apps. """
